entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 11. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:42 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 with patchy frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming clear late this evening and overnight. Low plus 1 with patchy frost. Forecast issued 6:42 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
